attributes.action: Stop the BBC from giving any more money towards the Eurovision Song Contest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, feel that it is a waste of license-fee payers' money to contribute towards the Song For Europe / Eurovision Song Contest. It produces one very expensive yet very poor night of television a year, and we resent effectively funding it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
